column4: Hello, i have a laptop Fujutsu Siemens Amilo pro v2030 and Ubuntu 8.10 installed, but i can't fix my resolution to 1024x768
i don't see a thing if i set it to a higher resolution
i'm using a laptop (with unichrome drivers)
did you find the system>preferences>screen resolution thing?
but i can't chose any other
pastebin the output of lspci | grep Video
ok, thats right. pastebin the output of lspci
